"Dash Panel": "If you access a Dash Panel with <%Access>, you can run at high speed for a short time."

"You can run at high speed for longer by chaining Dash Panels together.
(You do not need to re-access Dash Panels to chain them together.)

Actions that can be performed while dashing
<%Jump>: Jump
<%NormalAttack>/<%PhotonArts>: Kick attack

Kick attack power can be boosted up to 3 times by chaining Dash Panels together.

Chain Dash Panels well to reach your destination quickly and put a kick into your battles."
